review: Had issues getting this going, kept saying my network was unavailable. I noticed the prompting to point the stick away from the back of the TV and stuck it in the side port. It finally works!I'm still figuring it out. I switched from Apple TV. I miss my AirPlay. I thought I would be able to mirror any mobile device with this, but it's just Amazon devices. Searching apps is hard, finally found Beachbody OnDemand and am so glad I can use that! Wish I could organize my watch list and separate movies from TV and kids from adult selections. Better filters are also needed. Rather than just entering a password to watch anything I'd like to be able to block certain ratings and content or specific shows from even showing up.

review: I bought this because my previous box did not have Amazon on it. It sets up in a matter of minutes and is a breeze to use. I do wish the remote was a little bigger.The cord is just long enough as well. Sometimes I have trouble connecting to WiFi, but I believe it's my Internet service provider. Just make sure you have ample speed and you should have no problem.
